name: [Bitsy] - Me-Ouch!
description:
Manifesto

------------------------------------------

Project Purpose: 
This project was to be an informative interactive experience that is meant to educate people on cat de-clawing. The procedure is illegal in most countries, however, in the U.S -- it it still legal (in some states). The purpose of this project was to try and inform and change minds. A lot of people do not know what an actual 'de-claw' is. In short, it is an amputation. It is nothing like trimming your cat's claws.
Article: [SOURCE]

------------------------------------------

Project Goals:
The goal of this project was to further help change how people feel about the de-clawing process. I also do hope this will help player's who have played this game spread the word and stop the de-clawing process from happening to more feline friends in the U.S.

------------------------------------------

Created using the Bitsy tool
- Nicole Finegan
